text.text:
`function g(x)
    if x < 0 
        print("Enter function name: ")
        getfield(Base, Symbol(readline()))(x)
    else
        2*x^3 + 4*x^2 +5*x
    end
end`

`julia> g'(-pi/6)
Enter function name: sin
ERROR: Can't differentiate foreigncall expression
`
g'(2) works fine but the above case fails, why?

text: If you can give the full stacktrace that would help, but for the most part, readline might be calling into an external library which is easy to handle
